weka.clusterers

类 RandomizableSingleClustererEnhancer

  • java.lang.Object
    • weka.clusterers.AbstractClusterer
      • weka.clusterers.RandomizableSingleClustererEnhancer
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Serializable, Cloneable, Clusterer, CapabilitiesHandler, OptionHandler, Randomizable, RevisionHandler

    public abstract class RandomizableSingleClustererEnhancer
extends AbstractClusterer
implements OptionHandler, Randomizable
    Abstract utility class for handling settings common to randomizable clusterers.
    版本:
    $Revision: 1.3 $
    作者:
    FracPete (fracpete at waikato dot ac dot nz)
    另请参阅:
    序列化表格

      • getOptions

        public String[] getOptions()
        Gets the current settings of the classifier.
        指定者:

        返回:
